body:
This pull request adds a package for the PFFT parallel FFT library, which is based on FFTW and provides MPI-parallel multi-dimensional FFTs, while FFTW itself only implements single-dimensional FFTs in parallel.

Unfortunately, it currently requires a patch to be applied to FFTW. This pull request therefore includes changes to add an extra variant to the FFTW package.

For details, see the developer's website, https://www-user.tu-chemnitz.de/~potts/workgroup/pippig/software.php.
title: Add PFFT parallel FFT package
